name: Uncontrollable (fednazar)
description:
Uncontrollable is a simple platformer with an infinite number of procedurally generated levels set in different worlds and self-modifying keyboard controls.

Yes, your keyboard controls will change during the game from, for example, W-S-A-D movement to I-K-J-L or other keys. Your objective is simple: reach the end of the level and jump into the portal to another world. Also don't touch the red wall behind you.

How far will you go?

This game was made for Trijam 141.

Used assets:

Standard Assets for Unity 2018.3 by Unity Technologies (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/standard-assets-for...)

Skybox Series Free by Avionx (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skybox-series-fr...)

Music:

"Newer Wave" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
